Name: Bloody Everybody
About the game: Bloody Everybody is a bloody slasher game where you have to fight hordes of bloodthirsty demons, vampires and other undead, performing stylish combo attacks on them and turning the battlefield into a bloody mess. The main character is called a dreamer, blood also flows in him, but despite his mortality, he is very dexterous, fast, insane and as bloodthirsty as his relatives vampires. Among most of the aggressive inhabitants of this world, there are the most prominent personalities, they will not mind talking to you, helping and giving you advice, but even if this happens, this conversation will end in blood only. The places where you have to visit are inhabited by undead, vampires, gothic monsters and even mad nurses who can even make a blood transfusion to a skeleton. Thanks to the blood received after the battle, you can change the image of the dreamer and endow him with different abilities that complement his fighting style. In addition to blood, you have to find out who is really behind all these bloodthirsty creatures and who turned this world into Bloody Everybody.
